channel.title: NoTag on Paul Walczak
channel.description: Recent content in NoTag on Paul Walczak

item.title: Second Project
item.description: Latex test $$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}$$ Basics Documentation Control Flow if statements Form 1: if if name == 'Homer': print('Hi, Homer.') Form 2: if/else if name == 'Homer': print('Hi, Homer.') else: print('You are not Homer') Form 3: if/elif/else if name == 'Homer': print('Hi, Homer.') elif name == 'Marge': print('Hi Marge!') else: print('You are not Homer or Marge') for Loops The for loop iterates over a list, tuple, dictionary, set or string.
